Address: 2 Forest Heights Drive Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Quality Speaks for Itself
Located at the end of a private and quiet cul-de-sac, this beautiful Glen Loddon home is warm and welcoming. The large open plan living areas flow seamlessly out to a covered pergola and family friendly backyard. For year-round comfort, the home offers ducted refrigerated heating and cooling split into 6 separate zoned areas. Overlooking parkland and surrounded by quality homes, there is nothing to do but enjoy.
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with his/hers walk through robe and ensuite
Two separate living areas
3 other bedrooms with built-in robes
Open kitchen with generous fridge space
6 zone ducted refrigerated cooling and heating
2 door linen press plus further 4 door storage
Outside Features:
Extra large double garage with auto door
Quality landscaping and secure fencing
Large pergola for entertaining
Garden shed, raised vegetable gardens and established fruit trees
5KW solar panels
A beautifully presented home in a quiet location still within close proximity to schools, recreational facilities and all conveniences.

Description:
AFFORDABLE RETIREMENT LIVING
If you or a treasured family member are looking to downsize and enjoy the relaxed lifestyle, a wonderful opportunity is this lovely two-bedroom villa, located in the friendly and securely gated Rosedale Residential Village, with public transport nearby and Centro Lansell shopping just across the road. Offering very affordable, independent living, with both main and second bedrooms boasting built-in robes, while the master has a ceiling fan for the warmer months.
Entry via the sun lled front deck leads to the open plan lounge and adjoining kitchen/ dining area, well serviced with a reverse cycle split/system heating/cooling. The kitchen offers modern cooking appliances, plenty of bench space and ample storage. A comfortable bathroom with oversized shower & vanity is nearby the separate toilet. With linen storage and private access via a sturdy ramp and hand rail to your carport, rose garden and low maintenance outdoor area, garden shed & clothesline, this one is a must to inspect.
Small village atmosphere so you're not lost in the crowd
No Council Rates
No water/sewerage service charges (pay usage only)
Electricity, gas and telephone with providers of your choice
Community hall includes pool table, kitchen, bingo, carpet bowls, TV area, library and is ideal for functions, birthdays etc with family members welcome

Description:
GREAT DOWNSIZER OR INVESTMENT!
This unit is one of only 2 on the block and the generous backyard is testament to this. Featuring 2 generous bedrooms, a large 3 piece bathroom and separate toilet, this unit has all you need to move in or move a tenant in. The kitchen, though original, has been maintained to a high standard. The main living area features split system, gas wall furnace and ceiling fan, with the master bedroom also having a ceiling fan. Both bedrooms include built-in-robes to provide you with all the storage you will need. The laundry provides access to the enclosed back yard, which also features an undercover area. A larger-than-your-standard single garage includes a remote roller door. This unit is ideally suited to downsizers, investors and also first home buyers. Expected rental return for this property is approximately $260 per week.

Description:
Tidy brick home on a large block.
Situated in a quiet no-through street, this tidy brick veneer home is a proven performer for investors or an ideal first home or downsizer.
The front entry hall opens to a spacious gas-heated lounge followed by a roomy kitchen equipped with gas cooktop/electric wall oven, pantry cupboard, island bench/breakfast bar and adjoining meals/family area with sliding doors to an elevated sunny spot the perfect place to enjoy a coffee overlooking the big backyard.
The main bedroom includes robes and ensuite with two more bedrooms located handy to the family bathroom.
Outside, the approx. 840m² block includes double carport with rear access to the secure backyard and garden shed.
There's ample room for the family to kick the footy or have your own cricket match along with a place for pets to enjoy or plenty of space for further shedding if required.
Positioned close to primary and secondary schools, childcare and public transport with bush walking trails at the end of the street.
Well maintained, affordable brick homes are hard to find, so if you're in the market for your first, last or investment property, you should check this one out.
Currently let to great tenants, (who would be happy stay on), the home is in good condition with room to update and add value.

Description:
Reach for the affordable dream.
Neat as a pin inside and out, this package of great accommodation is located in a quiet street within easy walking distance to schools, childcare, bush reserve and public transport.
Pretty front landscaping includes garden beds of standard roses and gardenias around a specimen weeping tree with river stones edging the path to the front porch.
Inside, the immaculate three bedroom home offers tiled entry foyer and a warm and welcoming lounge room adjoining the bright and airy kitchen/meals/family area.
The bright kitchen is equipped with plenty of cabinetry, breakfast bar, quality cooking appliances, Bosch dishwasher and pantry. There are built-in robes to all bedrooms with a convenient two-way bathroom and toilet beside the main.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling, two gas wall furnaces, wall-mounted air conditioner in the kitchen, large laundry, good storage solutions and fresh paintwork throughout.
Sliding doors connect the meals area to a huge covered alfresco deck with bistro blinds making it the perfect all-weather outdoor living space big enough for large scale entertaining.
It overlooks the neat backyard where there's lawn surrounded by more manicured garden beds, a single garage/workshop, space for off-street parking and rear-roller door access from the double garage.
Reach for the affordable first home, retire in splendour or invest and let as is.
This one has the sweet smell of success about it and it's not all coming from the landscaped gardens.
Internal area
116m²

Description:
Low-maintenance for the win.
This 5-star energy rated house is built by the renowned JG King Homes and is situated less than 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD. Built on a compact allotment, surrounded by secure Colorbond fencing and low maintenance gardens along with a convenient garden shed and double garage.
Recent updates to the property include fresh paintwork throughout, quality roller blinds and updated carpet in the bedrooms and lounge. Consisting of three large bedrooms, master with walk-in-robe and ensuite whilst the remaining two bedrooms have large built in wardrobes including one with a full-length mirrored door and both share the centrally located family bathroom.
Entertain freely in the open plan kitchen/dining/lounge area which is amplified with the 2250mm high ceilings.The kitchen is equipped with modern stainless-steel appliances including a gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher and 2 door fridge/freezer plumbed for ice and cold water.
All bench tops are Caesar stone with a large stainless-steel sink, ample storage, a large two-door pantry and extra-long island bench/breakfast bar.Leading from the lounge is a fantastic, significantly sized under cover alfresco area, which includes a built in BBQ whilst the back yard is low maintenance and also includes a wood fire pizza oven plus a separate under cover pergola with built in seating.
For great convenience, the large laundry has space for washer and dryer under a bench, with an internal clothesline and a double door closet plus external access through the double sliding/security door. Secure parking is provided by the large double lock up garage with internal access to the house and to the backyard. This garage also has ample overhead shelving for additional storage.
You're sure to be warm in winter and cool in summer with a split system air conditioner, various ceiling fans plus, this house is also heated with a very economical gas central heating system.
Whether you're looking for an Investment property, new family home or settling down for retirement this home ticks all the boxes.
Internal area
135m²

Description:
Affordable home close to station
This well cared for home in a handy location close to the shops and railway station is a gem just waiting to be snapped up. With manicured front lawn and a neat and tidy front fence, the home offers consistent value throughout. Features include;
- Three good sized bedrooms, two with built-in robes - gas heating and air conditioning
- Light and bright kitchen with upright gas oven and gas hotplates
- Three piece bathroom with large shower
- Cosy light filled main lounge with gas heater
- Secure backyard with 6mtr x 3 mtr shed plus a 3mtr x 3mtr garden shed
- Undercover car parking for one car with roller door
Inspection will impress for owner occupiers or investors so call today to book your private viewing.

Description:
Affordable home close to station
This well cared for home in a handy location close to the shops and railway station is a gem just waiting to be snapped up. With manicured front lawn and a neat and tidy front fence, the home offers consistent value throughout. Features include;
- Three good sized bedrooms, two with built-in robes - gas heating and air conditioning
- Light and bright kitchen with upright gas oven and gas hotplates
- Three piece bathroom with large shower
- Cosy light filled main lounge with gas heater
- Secure backyard with 6mtr x 3 mtr shed plus a 3mtr x 3mtr garden shed
- Undercover car parking for one car with roller door
Inspection will impress for owner occupiers or investors so call today to book your private viewing.

Description:
Close to comfort.
Set in a growing and popular estate, this 681m2 approx. elevated lot in the new Cortland Close offers an excellent building opportunity for those looking to build the dream home and take advantage of the First Home Owners Grant.
This fully serviced lot is situated in a quite court and close to all things desirable such as schools, public transport and supermarkets and has views of the new and improved Lansell Square.
The large structure already existing can be included in your building plans or removed upon negotiations.
With no body corporate or shared services to worry about, it certainly won't take long to call Cortland Close "home".
Feel free to inspect and walk over the block at your leisure. For any further information contact Jesse Forbes on 0477 277 600.
Insights: 5 Cortland Close, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
50's And Over, A New Lifestyle
This immaculate two bedroom home is now for sale, however when buying this property you're also buying into a lifestyle and friendly supportive community.
Aviva communities is a lifestyle village for over 50's and offers a cinema, bowling green, swimming pool, gym, community garden, bar and lounges and so much more.
Aviva is a great place to meet with friends, feel secure, feel connected and feel re-invigorated.
Ideally placed amongst beautiful gums in a tranquil setting, public transport is close, shopping centres just down the road.
HOME FEATURES INCLUDE:
* Wall, floor & ceiling insulation
* Ducted heating & cooling
* Stainless steel oven, cooktop, Range hood, Dishwasher
* Window furnishings throughout
* Landscaping with garden shed
* Single carport
* Outside awnings
* Letterbox at Clubhouse
* Plenty of storage

Description:
MAKE THIS HOUSE A HOME
Nestled in a quiet nook of Crusoe Road sits this well held, neat and tidy three-bedroom home ideal for the first home buyer looking to start their property portfolio or their next renovation dream.
Imagine yourself sketching out your fresh new plans to tailor this home to suit you and your lifestyle, transforming it into your ideal cosy home.
You'll feel well secure the moment you enter the property with its colorbond private front fencing and screening and a single lock up garage.
Inside, bedrooms 1 and 2 boasts built in wardrobe storage and mirrored vanities and decorative light fittings. The location of the large laundry next to the 3rd bedroom opens up a wonderful opportunity to convert into an ensuite as part of your renovation plans.
The kitchen offers all the essentials including adequate storage and potential for some fresh touches as well as the master bathroom.
Offering rear access to the backyard via Mitchell Street and an established workshop and shed the right buyer will make this house into a comfortable home.
Located right off High Street take a short walk or drive to all of Kangaroo Flat's amenities and offerings including popular Lansell Square.
Opportunities to buy in this location are a rarity so be quick to arrange any inspection today. Contact agents Marc Cox or Justin Pell.
Insights: 8 Crusoe Road, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
THE PERFECT SETTING TO ENJOY RETIREMENT
This low maintenance two-bedroom villa in the Rosedale Residential Village offers independent pet-friendly living and the opportunity to sell the lawn mower and enjoy the village lifestyle with public transport out front and Lansell Square shopping just across the road. Offering spacious and carpeted open plan living/dining with bay windows letting in natural light. Great kitchen has ample bench space and cupboards, Bosch dishwasher, electric oven and gas hotplates.
Head outside via private access to your own carport, undercover outdoor entertaining area and garden shed, while the rear yard provides ample room for the vegetable garden. Bathroom includes oversized shower, vanity and separate toilet. Ducted floor heating, split system aircon/heating and ceiling fans ensure year-round comfort.
Small village atmosphere so you're not lost in the crowd
No Council Rates
No water/sewerage charges
Electricity, gas and telephone with providers of your choice
Community hall includes pool table, kitchen, bingo, carpet bowls, TV area, library and is ideal for functions, birthdays etc with family members welcome
Insights: 26/266-270 High Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 24 other 2 bedroom unit in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect to live in or invest
A wonderful location close to leisure facilities and public transport, this is the perfect investment or to move in for yourself. With an open plan living and dining area you don't feel hemmed in and with the kitchen boasting plenty of storage and natural light there is plenty of room for making the perfect meal.
Features of this home include; two good sized bedrooms both with built-in robes, three-piece bathroom, separate laundry and toilet, gas heating and air conditioning. With a single lock up garage and an extra spot to park in front of it, plus a secure low maintenance yard, this home provides an easy living option for an owner occupier or tenant.
